p1-1.description: Finalize the schedule of the day with KIDS representative

p1-2.description: Work with the venue for a health & safety assessment

p1-3.description: Recruit volunteers to help out on the event days

p1-4.description: Identify Speaker to deliver a talk on the importance of staying in education

p1-5.description: Submit Proposal for the Games Night events

p1-6.description: Arrange catering for the event days
